clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Oxygen Consumption and Energy Expenditure During Spontaneous Breathing Trial.
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Oxygen Consumption and Energy Expenditure During Spontaneous Breathing Trial - A Randomized Crossover Controled Trial.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare the oxygen consumption and energy expenditure during the spontaneous breathing trial.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients is going to submit to the 2 spontaneous breathing trial ( Automatic tube compensation plus continuous positive airway pressure and continuous positive airway pressure without automatic tube compensation. The oxygen consumption and energy expenditure is going to measure during the spontaneous breathing trial by indirect calorimetry.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Supportive Care

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of oxygen consumption through indirect calorimetry.
primary_outcome.time_frame: The measurement is during the spontaneous breathing trial, 30 minutes.
primary_outcome.description: Measurements using indirect calorimetry for determination of oxygen consumption

secondary_outcome.measure: Measurement of energy expenditure through indirect calorimetry
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The measurement is during the spontaneous breathing trial, 30 minutes.
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement using indirect calorimetry for determination of energy expenditure.

arm_group.description: The patients is going to undergo trials of spontaneous breathing with automatic tube compensation plus continuous positive airway pressure and later a trial with continuous positive airway pressure. During 30 minutes.

The patients is going to undergo a trial of spontaneous breathing with continuous positive airway pressure and later with automatic tube compensation plus continuous positive airway pressure, during 30 minutes each.

intervention.description: SPONTANEOUS BREATHING TRIAL WITH AUTOMATIC TUBE COMPENSATION plus CPAP

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- INTUBATED PATIENTS>24h
- PaO2 GREATER THAN 60 mmHg WITH FiO2 LESS THAN 40%
- PEEP=5 cmH2O SUPPORT PRESSURE=8 CMH2O
- USING EVITA MECHANICAL VENTILATOR
Exclusion Criteria:
- CARDIOVASCULAR INSTABILITY
- AFEBRILE
- CHEST DRAINAGE
- RESPIRATORY RATE/TIDAL VOLUME RATIO GREATER THAN 105
- PREGNANCY
- FAIL IN THE SPONTANEOUS BREATHING TRIAL
- LEAKS IN THE CIRCUIT
- AGITATION
